plays.text: Penalty to Craig Johnson 2 minutes for Interference Sergei Fedorov

Goal scored by Lubomir Visnovsky assisted by Jason Allison and Adam Deadmarsh

Penalty to Brad Norton 5 minutes for Fighting Darren McCarty
Penalty to Darren McCarty 5 minutes for Fighting Brad Norton
Penalty to Darren McCarty 10 minutes for Misconduct Brad Norton
Penalty to Darren McCarty 2 minutes for Tripping Brad Norton served by Tomas Holmstrom
2 minute Bench Penalty for Instigator served by Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Interference Erik Rasmussen
Penalty to Adam Deadmarsh 2 minutes for Hooking Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Brett Hull 2 minutes for High Sticking Adam Deadmarsh
Goal scored by Mathieu Schneider assisted by Zigmund Palffy and Bryan Smolinski
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Tripping Ian Laperriere
Goal scored by Pavel Datsyuk assisted by Brett Hull and Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Lubomir Visnovsky 2 minutes for Kneeing Luc Robitaille
Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Interference Adam Deadmarsh
Penalty to Mikko Eloranta 2 minutes for Holding Boyd Devereaux
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Jason Allison assisted by Alexander Frolov and Jaroslav Bednar
Penalty to Bryan Smolinski 2 minutes for Slashing Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Bryan Smolinski
